content:
ModelDataSourceView Class

In this Article

Represents a single view of a ModelDataSource control.

Syntax

Declaration

public class ModelDataSourceView : System.Web.UI.DataSourceView, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Web.UI.DataSourceView
  • ModelDataSourceView

Inherited Members

,
Equals(Object,Object)
,

,
Name
,
OnDataSourceViewChanged(EventArgs)
,
RaiseUnsupportedCapabilityError(DataSourceCapabilities)

Remarks

For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see Model Binding and Web Forms.

Constructors summary

ModelDataSourceView(ModelDataSource)

Initializes a new instance of the ModelDataSourceView class.

Properties summary

CanDelete

Gets a value that indicates whether the ModelDataSourceView object that is associated with the current ModelDataSource control supports the delete operation.
CanInsert

Gets a value that indicates whether the ModelDataSourceView object that is associated with the current ModelDataSource control supports the insert operation.
CanPage

Gets a value that indicates whether the ModelDataSourceView object that is associated with the current ModelDataSource control supports paging through the retrieved data.
CanRetrieveTotalRowCount

Gets a value that indicates whether the ModelDataSourceView object that is associated with the current ModelDataSource control supports retrieving the total number of data rows, in addition to the set of data.
CanSort

Gets a value that indicates whether the ModelDataSourceView object that is associated with the current ModelDataSource control supports a sorted view on the underlying data source.
CanUpdate

Gets a value that indicates whether the ModelDataSourceView object that is associated with the current ModelDataSource control supports the update operation.
DataKeyName

Gets the first item in the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames* array of the data-bound control if the data-bound control is a FormView, ListView, GridView, or DetailsView control.
DeleteMethod

Gets or sets the name of the method that the ModelDataSourceView object invokes to delete data.
InsertMethod

Gets or sets the name of the method that the ModelDataSourceView object invokes to insert data.
ModelTypeName

Gets the data type name for the data bound control.
SelectMethod

Gets or sets the name of the method that the ModelDataSourceView control invokes to retrieve data.
UpdateMethod

Gets or sets the name of the method that the ModelDataSourceView object invokes to update data.

Methods summary

CreateSelectResult(Object)

Returns the result of a Select operation after converting it to an IEnumerable collection if it is not already one.
Delete(IDictionary,IDictionary,DataSourceViewOperationCallback)

Deletes a method and gets the result.
EvaluateDeleteMethodParameters(IDictionary,IDictionary)

Invokes the Delete method and gets the result.
EvaluateInsertMethodParameters(IDictionary)

Invokes the insert method.
EvaluateMethodParameters(DataSourceOperation,ModelDataSourceMethod,IDictionary)

Evaluates the method parameters for model binding, using the data source operation, the data source method object, and the control values.
EvaluateMethodParameters(DataSourceOperation,ModelDataSourceMethod,IDictionary,Boolean)

Evaluates the method parameters for model binding, using the data source operation, the data source method object, the control values, and a value that indicates whether this method is called in the page's LoadComplete event handler.
EvaluateSelectMethodParameters(DataSourceSelectArguments,DataSourceSelectResultProcessingOptions)

Evaluates the select method parameters and also determines the options for processing the select result, such as auto paging and sorting behavior.
EvaluateUpdateMethodParameters(IDictionary,IDictionary,IDictionary)

Invokes the Update method and gets the result.
ExecuteDelete(IDictionary,IDictionary)

Performs a delete operation using the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.DeleteMethod* method.
ExecuteInsert(IDictionary)

Performs an insert operation using the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.InsertMethod* method.
ExecuteSelect(DataSourceSelectArguments)

Performs a select operation using the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.SelectMethod* method.
ExecuteUpdate(IDictionary,IDictionary,IDictionary)

Performs an update operation using the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.UpdateMethod* method.
FindMethod(String)

Finds the method to be executed.
GetDeleteMethodResult(IDictionary,IDictionary)

Invokes the delete method and gets the result.
GetInsertMethodResult(IDictionary)

Invokes the insert method and gets the result.
GetSelectMethodResult(DataSourceSelectArguments)

Invokes the select method and gets the result.
GetUpdateMethodResult(IDictionary,IDictionary,IDictionary)

Invokes the update method and gets the result.
Insert(IDictionary,DataSourceViewOperationCallback)

Inserts a method and gets the result.
InvokeMethod(ModelDataSourceMethod)

Invokes a data method.
IsTrackingViewState()

Returns a value that indicates whether the control stores state in view state.
LoadViewState(Object)

Restores previously saved view state for the data source view.
OnCallingDataMethods(CallingDataMethodsEventArgs)

Raises the CallingDataMethods event.
ProcessSelectMethodResult(DataSourceSelectArguments,DataSourceSelectResultProcessingOptions,ModelDataMethodResult)

Performs operations on the select method result like auto paging and sorting if applicable.
SaveViewState()

Saves the changes to the view state for the ModelDataSourceView object since the time when the page was posted back to the server.
Select(DataSourceSelectArguments,DataSourceViewSelectCallback)

Selects the method and gets the result.
TrackViewState()

Causes the ModelDataSourceView object to track changes to its view state so that the changes can be stored in the stem.Web.UI.Control.ViewState* object for the control and persisted across requests for the same page.
Update(IDictionary,IDictionary,IDictionary,DataSourceViewOperationCallback)

Updates the specified methods using the values provided in the parameters.
UpdateProperties(String,String,String,String,String,String)

Updates the specified properties using the values provided in the parameters.

Events summary

CallingDataMethods

Occurs when data methods are being called.

Explicit Interface Implementations summary

IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState

Gets a value indicating whether a server control is tracking its view state changes.
IStateManager.LoadViewState(Object)

Loads the server controlâ€™s previously saved view state to the control.
IStateManager.SaveViewState()

Saves the changes to a server controlâ€™s view state to an Object.
IStateManager.TrackViewState()

Instructs the server control to track changes to its view state.

    Initializes a new instance of the ModelDataSourceView class.

    public ModelDataSourceView (System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource owner);

    Parameters

    • owner
      ModelDataSource

      The model data source that owns this view.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      The owner parameter is null.

Properties

  • CanDelete

    Gets a value that indicates whether the ModelDataSourceView object that is associated with the current ModelDataSource control supports the delete operation.

    public override bool CanDelete { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    Returns true if the DeleteMethod property has a value.

  • CanInsert

    Gets a value that indicates whether the ModelDataSourceView object that is associated with the current ModelDataSource control supports the insert operation.

    public override bool CanInsert { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    Returns true if the InsertMethod property has a value.

  • CanPage

    Gets a value that indicates whether the ModelDataSourceView object that is associated with the current ModelDataSource control supports paging through the retrieved data.

    public override bool CanPage { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false.

  • CanRetrieveTotalRowCount

    Gets a value that indicates whether the ModelDataSourceView object that is associated with the current ModelDataSource control supports retrieving the total number of data rows, in addition to the set of data.

    public override bool CanRetrieveTotalRowCount { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false.

  • CanSort

    Gets a value that indicates whether the ModelDataSourceView object that is associated with the current ModelDataSource control supports a sorted view on the underlying data source.

    public override bool CanSort { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false.

  • CanUpdate

    Gets a value that indicates whether the ModelDataSourceView object that is associated with the current ModelDataSource control supports the update operation.

    public override bool CanUpdate { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false.

    Returns true if the UpdateMethod property has a value.

  • DataKeyName

    Gets the first item in the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames* array of the data-bound control if the data-bound control is a FormView, ListView, GridView, or DetailsView control.

    public string DataKeyName { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The first item in the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames* array of a FormView, ListView, GridView, or DetailsView control, or an empty string for other data-bound controls.

  • DeleteMethod

    Gets or sets the name of the method that the ModelDataSourceView object invokes to delete data.

    public string DeleteMethod { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that represents the name of the method or that the ModelDataSourceView uses to delete data.

  • InsertMethod

    Gets or sets the name of the method that the ModelDataSourceView object invokes to insert data.

    public string InsertMethod { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that represents the name of the method that the ModelDataSourceView uses to insert data.

  • ModelTypeName

    Gets the data type name for the data bound control.

    public string ModelTypeName { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The data type name for the data bound control.

  • SelectMethod

    Gets or sets the name of the method that the ModelDataSourceView control invokes to retrieve data.

    public string SelectMethod { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that represents the name of the method that the ModelDataSourceView uses to retrieve data.

    public string UpdateMethod { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that represents the name of the method that the ModelDataSourceView uses to update data.

  • EvaluateMethodParameters(DataSourceOperation,ModelDataSourceMethod,IDictionary)

    Evaluates the method parameters for model binding, using the data source operation, the data source method object, and the control values.

    protected virtual void EvaluateMethodParameters (System.Web.UI.DataSourceOperation dataSourceOperation, System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceMethod modelDataSourceMethod, System.Collections.IDictionary controlValues);

    Parameters

    • dataSourceOperation
      DataSourceOperation

      The data source operation for which the parameters are being evaluated.

    • modelDataSourceMethod
      ModelDataSourceMethod

      The method object for which the parameters are being evaluated.

    • controlValues
      IDictionary

      The values from the data-bound control.

    Remarks

    This method calls the System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.EvaluateMethodParameters(DataSourceOperation,ModelDataSourceMethod,IDictionary,Boolean) overload with the isPageLoadComplete parameter set to false.

  • EvaluateMethodParameters(DataSourceOperation,ModelDataSourceMethod,IDictionary,Boolean)

    Evaluates the method parameters for model binding, using the data source operation, the data source method object, the control values, and a value that indicates whether this method is called in the page's LoadComplete event handler.

    protected virtual void EvaluateMethodParameters (System.Web.UI.DataSourceOperation dataSourceOperation, System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceMethod modelDataSourceMethod, System.Collections.IDictionary controlValues, bool isPageLoadComplete);

    Parameters

    • dataSourceOperation
      DataSourceOperation

      The data source operation for which the parameters are being evaluated.

    • modelDataSourceMethod
      ModelDataSourceMethod

      The method object for which the parameters are being evaluated.

    • controlValues
      IDictionary

      The values from the data-bound control.

    • isPageLoadComplete
      Boolean

      Set to true if this method is called in the page's LoadComplete event handler, and if it is called to evaluate the select method parameters, and if custom value providers are being used. This makes it possible to identify changes in the custom value providers in order to mark the data-bound control for data binding if necessary.

  • EvaluateSelectMethodParameters(DataSourceSelectArguments,DataSourceSelectResultProcessingOptions)

    Evaluates the select method parameters and also determines the options for processing the select result, such as auto paging and sorting behavior.

    protected virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceMethod EvaluateSelectMethodParameters (System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments arguments, out System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataSourceSelectResultProcessingOptions selectResultProcessingOptions);

    Parameters

    • arguments
      DataSourceSelectArguments

      The DataSourceSelectArguments for the select operation.

    • selectResultProcessingOptions
      DataSourceSelectResultProcessingOptions

      The DataSourceSelectResultProcessingOptions to use for processing the select result once the select operation is complete. These options are determined in this method and later used by the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.ProcessSelectMethodResult* method.

    Returns

    • ModelDataSourceMethod

      The information required to invoke the select method.

    Returns

      The number of rows deleted; otherwise, -1, if the number is not known.

    Finds the method to be executed.

    protected virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceMethod FindMethod (string methodName);

    Parameters

    • methodName
      String

      The name of the method to be executed.

    Returns

    • ModelDataSourceMethod

      A ModelDataSourceMethod object with the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceMethod.Instance* and stem.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceMethod.MethodInfo* properties set. The stem.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceMethod.Parameters* collection of the ModelDataSourceMethod object is still empty when this method returns.

    Exceptions

    • InvalidOperationException

      The stem.Web.UI.WebControls.CallingDataMethodsEventArgs.DataMethodsObject* property and the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.CallingDataMethodsEventArgs.DataMethodsType* property both have values, or the specified method was not found.

  • ProcessSelectMethodResult(DataSourceSelectArguments,DataSourceSelectResultProcessingOptions,ModelDataMethodResult)

    Performs operations on the select method result like auto paging and sorting if applicable.

    protected virtual object ProcessSelectMethodResult (System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments arguments, System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataSourceSelectResultProcessingOptions selectResultProcessingOptions, System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataMethodResult result);

      The result after operations like auto paging/sorting are done.

    Saves the changes to the view state for the ModelDataSourceView object since the time when the page was posted back to the server.

    Causes the ModelDataSourceView object to track changes to its view state so that the changes can be stored in the stem.Web.UI.Control.ViewState* object for the control and persisted across requests for the same page.

    Remarks

    The TrackViewState method is primarily used by control developers.

  • IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState

    Gets a value indicating whether a server control is tracking its view state changes.

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the ModelDataSourceView instance is cast to the IStateManager interface.
